issue.title: [CF 1259] Abilities with two charges
issue.body:
Is there any easy way of tracking an enemy's cooldown with multiple charges such as Iceblock or Blessing of Protection/Sacrifice/Freedom? They have 2 charges and it would be awesome if I could track that. I know there are addons such as Omnibar who do this but it would be nice if I could do this with TellMeWhen somehow. Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1259 | Raw

comments.body:
No, there isn't, and there are no plans to implement something like this. Sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
